pageContext.display_address: Laguna Beach Community & Susi Q Center, 380 3rd St., Laguna Beach, CA 92651
pageContext.public_note: For more information, please call Laguna Beach Recreation at (949) 464-6645.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Power on your STEM concepts and Minecraft gaming skills for a full day of LEGO® fun! Learn about architecture and engineering by building Trains, Helicopters, Treehouses, and Beam Bridges. Then Mine, Craft, and Build your way to fun in the Adventure mode of our unique Minecraft gaming experience!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Minecraft Adventure w/LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
pageContext.action_url_comment: To register go to www.lagunabeachcity.net click on recreation classes. Register early, class fill quickly.
